t: Amazon launches first brick-and-mortar store in Milan, Italy
s: February 12, 2025 - E-commerce giant Amazon has expanded its footprint in Europe with the opening of its first physical retail space in the centre of Milan, Italy on 12 February 2025. The store, named Amazon Parafarmacia & Beauty, offers curated beauty and personal care products from brands such as Eucerin, La ...

t: First Look: Amazon’s first store in Italy is focused on beauty and personal care | Chain Store Age
s: February 12, 2025 - Located in Milan’s busy city center, new Amazon Parafarmacia & Beauty provides a curated selection of beauty and personal care products. Amazon opened the store as part of broader effort to expand its online beauty and personal care product offerings across Europe.

t: Amazon Is Trying Physical Retail Again: This Time It’s A Beauty Store In Milan
s: March 1, 2025 - Inside Amazon Parafarmacia & Beauty store in MilanCourtesy of Amazon ... Derma-centric skin and personal care brands will be carried in the store, including Eucerin, La Roche-Posay, Vichy, Avène, Bionike, Rilastil, CeraVe.

t: Amazon opens beauty and personal care store in Italy as part of brick-and-mortar expansion
s: February 11, 2025 - The store is located in the city center of Milan, and features a range of beauty and personal care items, as well as nonprescription drugs, Amazon said in a blog post. The first store, which is called Amazon Parafarmacia & Beauty, will open its doors to the public on Wednesday. The store will ...
